mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bird_project ( projectNo, title, kaopudengji, totalMoney, yearRate, duteTime, huankuanfangshi, jiekuanyongtu, jiekuanmiaoshu, huankuanlaiyuan, toubiaojindu, shengyutianshu, ketouMoney, userId, status, createTime, updateTime ) VALUES( #{projectNo}, #{title}, #{kaopudengji}, #{totalMoney}, #{yearRate}, #{duteTime}, #{huankuanfangshi}, #{jiekuanyongtu}, #{jiekuanmiaoshu}, #{huankuanlaiyuan}, #{toubiaojindu}, #{shengyutianshu}, #{ketouMoney}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bird_project WHERE 1=1 and projectNo = #{projectNo}
SELECT * FROM bird_project WHERE 1=1 AND totalMoney is NULL LIMIT #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: UPDATE bird_project SET title = #{title}, kaopudengji = #{kaopudengji}, totalMoney = #{totalMoney}, yearRate = #{yearRate}, duteTime = #{duteTime}, huankuanfangshi = #{huankuanfangshi}, jiekuanyongtu = #{jiekuanyongtu}, jiekuanmiaoshu = #{jiekuanmiaoshu}, huankuanlaiyuan = #{huankuanlaiyuan}, toubiaojindu = #{toubiaojindu}, shengyutianshu = #{shengyutianshu}, ketouMoney = #{ketouMoney}, userId = #{userId}, status = #{status}, updateTime = #{updateTime} WHERE id =#{id}
